name: Niro
description:
Play Niro, a fictional character based on the last Roman emperor, Nero. Set 21 of your subjects on fire, including gladiators, spectators, and noblemen!

Please download the Windows version if you experience lag in the  browser.

GAME JAM

We made Niro for Mini Jam 51: Rome based on the limitation, "The player is a villain." We wanted to design a mini-game for a historical fantasy we were working on, Exponentia, a visual novel for NaNoRen0 2020. 

Thanks for trying out our 3-day game-jammed mini-game! <3
